main event: A radar operator on board a US Coast Guard cutter observed an unidentified object rising rapidly from the water and taking off at high speed during a patrol in the Atlantic Ocean.
interesting points: The object appeared as a large target on the radar screen.,The observation lasted for 5 minutes.,The object had a north-south course.,The speed of the object was described as tremendous.,There were reports of a reddish conical-shaped object with a red trail of fire during another sighting.
sighted object: an unidentified object rising from the water
witness description: radar operator on a US Coast Guard cutter
